synopsis.text: Aiza, Igawa, and Arima, three prodigious pianists, find themselves locked in a fierce rivalry within the hallowed halls of Towa. As a young boy, Arima's emotive and captivating performance strikes a chord with the free-spirited Igawa, while the eccentric Aiza is drawn to his meticulous and precise technique. As the trio competes, they each face their own set of challenges, shaping their unique musical styles. Igawa endeavors to rekindle the passion in Arima's earlier performances, while Aiza transforms his admiration for Arima into an unwavering determination to surpass him. This OVA, bundled with the 11th volume of the Shigatsu wa Kimi no Uso manga, offers a glimpse into the formative years of these gifted musicians and the inception of their intense rivalry.
